name: School Days (itch)
description:
School Days is a RPG / Visual Novel game where you control Tweek, a little bird on his way to school... but everything is not okay.

This game was created in 3 days for the first #IndieTalesJam. Theme: One Room.

Spoiler: School Days is inspired by the mechanic of Silent Hill PT: it's the same room over and over, but things still change.

  • Move: Arrows or ZQSD
  • Action: E, Space, Enter (you can interact with pretty much everything)
  • You can also play with a controller (not tested)
  • /!\ Use the mouse on the menu /!\
  • Game Engine: Godot Engine
  • Art: Paint.net (mostly) / Libresprite
  • Music / Sounds: Musescore / Audacity / Bosca Ceoil / ChipTone
  • Font: Yoster Island
  • Glitch Shader effect

I did everything by myself, except the font and the glitch shader.

School Days est un RPG / Visual Novel dans lequel vous contrôlez Tweek, un petit oiseau allant à l'école, mais... tout ne se passe pas comme prévu.

Ce jeu a été créé en 3 jours pour la premier #IndieTalesJam. Thème: One Room.

Spoiler: School Days a été inspiré par la mécanique principale de Silent Hill PT: à savoir, on parcourt tout le temps la même salle, mais certains détails changent en permanence.
